title: I don't know if it's normal but i didnt receive any key fragment since 10 wins i think?
body: I don't know if it's normal but i didnt receive any key fragment since 10 win i think?

replies.body:
The drop rate for key fragments is more of a curve than a line. Each key that drops reduces the chances of the next drop exponentially. The drop rate resets approximately 30 days after the first drop.

Check out our [Hextech Crafting Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) for more information on this system. Let me know if you have any other questions.
